name: Bunny Patch
description:
Protect your carrot patch from encroaching weeds.

Made in 48 hours for global game jam 2023.

Click next turn to advance time by a few step, and you can watch as the game world changes. When the carrots sparkle, it means they have been harvested and added to your carrot bank in the top right. You can click on the button in the top left to open the shop and buy tiles that interact with the world in some way.

Credits

Laura King - Art and Game Design

Noam Zeise -  Code and Game Design

Mick Cooke (MakeFire Music) - Music and Sound Effects  

Meet the Tiles Goat

Eats any carrots or weeds around him

Bush

Grows diagonally and acts as a barrier for weeds

Ice

Freezes any blocks around it and prevents them from working

Water

Waters any carrots surrounding it and causes them to spread

Key

Opens the door...

Controls

The game can be controlled with the mouse alone, but there is the option of using keys for some controls

  • WASD - camera move
  • n - next turn
  • plus/minus  - grow/shrink screen
